_description: Curated semantic mappings between external evaluation endpoints and ToxTransformer property tokens
_note: Each external endpoint is mapped ONLY to semantically equivalent ToxTransformer tokens. Endpoints without appropriate matches should NOT be evaluated.

cyp2e1.description: CYP2E1 - NO DIRECT INHIBITION ASSAY AVAILABLE

unmappable_endpoints._description: External endpoints that CANNOT be properly evaluated because no semantically appropriate ToxTransformer tokens exist

endpoints.reason: UniTox organ-specific toxicity (cardio, dermal, pulmonary, renal, oto) maps to generic cytotoxicity assays - semantically inappropriate
No CYP2E1 inhibition assays in training data - only expression/downregulation assays
Physical property, not a toxicity endpoint - no prediction needed
Specific Daphnia EC50 values require regression on aquatic endpoints - current assays are primarily classification
